org.colomoto.mddlib.internal

Interface MDDStore

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MDDManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MDDStoreImpl

    public interface MDDStore
extends MDDManager
    Interface for the raw MDD store. A MDDStore is a MDDManager, which can also be used as backend for MDDManagerProxy
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

      • getNode

        int getNode(int var,
          int lchild,
          int rchild)
        Retrieve or create a node in the backend. This is called by MDDVariable.getNode() or by internal store methods: it should not be used directly.

      • reach

        byte reach(int node,
         byte[] values,
         int[] orderMap)
        Find the leaf reached for a given variable assignment and custom order. This is used by proxy MDDManager to implement reach(int byte[])
